content: this pattern is free when signing up for the creative crochet corner 1 newsletter the video tutorial is free to watch over here at the creative crochet corner 2 or over here on youtube 3 big squishy cables are nice and warm… and so much fun to crochet make sure to choose your yarn wisely to ensure your hat has a pleasant drape to it using a soft fluffy yarn will keep your post stitches from becoming too stiff and give you an ultra-comfy finished product the wide ribbed cuff adds extra warmth for those chilly winter days and boosts the cozy factor of this super cute hat 1 http //go creativecrochetcorner com/a34628/ 2 https //www creativecrochetcorner com/video/glacier-cabled-beanie/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=saew0v5puf8
